sections.heading: Necessity for judgment and executionExcept as provided in Article 3513, a final judgment must be obtained in an action where a writ of attachment or of sequestration has issued before the property seized can be sold to satisfy the claim
sections.text: Necessity for judgment and executionExcept as provided in Article 3513, a final judgment must be obtained in an action where a writ of attachment or of sequestration has issued before the property seized can be sold to satisfy the claim.
